title: Corazón Valiente
overview: This is the story of the friendship between two girls. Angela Valdez was the daughter of Miguel Valdez, the bodyguard of the Sandoval Navarro family. Samantha Sandoval Navarro was the rich girl guarded by Miguel Valdez. The lives of the two girls changed when Samantha was kidnapped and Miguel Valdez sacrificed his life to save her. After what happened, the girls were separated. Angela and Samantha meet again after eighteen years. Angela works as a baker. She is married to Luis Martínez and has a daughter, Violeta. Samantha works as a bodyguard. Samantha comes up with the idea of inviting Angela to work with her. Angela accepts...
